import React from "react"; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import './signin.css' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import InputGroup from 'react-bootstrap/InputGroup'; import './Signup.css' const Signup = ({submitting,changeemail,changepassword,repassword,backtologin2}) =>{ return (
Signup
Profile Id E-mail Password Confirm Password Log In
) } export default Signup
